library(quanteda)
library(tm)
library(dplyr)
library(NMF)
library(udpipe)
library(syuzhet)
library(stringr)
library(flextable)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)

df <- readRDS("data.rds")

foo <- df%>%count(screen_name)%>%arrange(desc(n))%>%filter(n<=5)
#df%>%filter(screen_name=="_a_l_a_y_l_m_")

vect_screen <- foo$screen_name

dfoo <- df%>%filter(screen_name%in%vect_screen)

foo <- table(dfoo$Marque)
foo<-as.data.frame(foo)
names(foo)<- c("Marque","Somme")
foo <- foo%>%arrange(desc(Somme))
flextable(foo)
